Kable-formatted table:

```{r echo=FALSE}

```


```{r}
# outputs the HTML to an external file
kable(mtcars[1:3, 1:3], "html") %>%
  kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c("striped", "hover")) %>%
  cat(., file = "df.html")
```
